summary: Provides a PyTorch-compatible dataset that loads instance and class images, applies resizing and optional center cropping, tokenizes associated prompts, and optionally encodes images to VAE latents for efficient fine‑tuning of DreamBooth models.
business_intent: Enable streamlined preparation of training data for DreamBooth fine‑tuning, including regularization via prior preservation, to improve model personalization while reducing preprocessing overhead.
